channel.title: AKAJ'S[Custom]Server 1.12.1
channel.description:
[u]AKAJ'S[Custom]Server.[/u] [size=5]NO LAG!!![/size] LvL cap is 130 there are Tier 1 vendors, 1 Custom instance(soon to be more), custom portals+custom vendors+custom items Events Lvl 1 unraced mounts And custom bosses!(soon to be a whole lot more!)
[size=5]RATES[/size] # Drop rates # Default: 1 Rate.Drop.Items = 200 Rate.Drop.Money = 400
# XP rates # Default: 1 Rate.XP.Kill = 165 Rate.XP.Quest = 165 Rate.XP.Explore = 165

This is my friends server.
